programme.title: Timeline
programme.desc: Adventure. A group of Yale students studying a medieval site, travel back in time to France circa 1357, amid archaic war, deadly diseases and other unexpected pitfalls, to rescue their professor (Billy Connolly)

programme.title: The Osiris Child
programme.desc: Action and adventure starring Kellan Lutz and Daniel Macpherson. Set in the future in a time of interplanetary colonization, an unlikely pair race against an impending global crisis and are confronted by the monsters that live inside us all

programme.title: Thor: The Dark World
programme.desc: Action adventure with Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman. When the vengeful leader of a primordial race seeks to destroy the Nine Realms, the god of thunder reunites with Jane Foster and prepares to make the ultimate sacrifice to save the world from certain destruction

programme.title: Timeline
programme.desc: Adventure. A group of Yale students studying a medieval site, travel back in time to France circa 1357, amid archaic war, deadly diseases and other unexpected pitfalls, to rescue their professor (Billy Connolly)

programme.title: Kill'em All
programme.desc: Action with Jean-Claude Van Damme. A mysterious stranger arrives at a hospital after being wounded during a massive shootout. Foreign agents pursue him into the hospital, catching doctors and nurses in the crossfire

programme.title: Dark Paradise
programme.desc: Thriller. A female business woman gets in over her head after inheriting some money and encountering a dangerous bad boy in Hawaii

programme.title: Flight Of The Intruder
programme.desc: Action. A bereaved bomber pilot schemes with a hardened veteran to make an unauthorised air strike on Hanoi itself. The raid lands the duo in hot water, until peace talks collapse and President Nixon authorises a new strike. Danny Glover, Willem Dafoe, Brad Johnson

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: A story inspired by "The Canterbury Tales" starring Heath Ledger. When his master dies, a young squire with a gift for jousting hits the road with his two cohorts to prove himself a worthy knight

programme.title: Patriots Day
programme.desc: Drama with Mark Wahlberg. An account of Boston Police Commissioner Ed Davis's actions in the events leading up to the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing and its aftermath, which includes the city-wide manhunt to find the terrorists behind it

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: Action. Col. Matrix (Schwarzenegger) is living quietly with his daughter when she's kidnapped by an exiled dictator. His plan is to reinstate himself in power by eliminating his country's president, using Matrix to kill the president, to stop him killing the daughter

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Crime. A psychopathic Japanese executive accidentally triggers a journalist's dark side and they begin to form a strange bond over the Internet

programme.title: Cyber Case
programme.desc: Thriller. A young woman uses geotagged pictures to help rescue her kidnapped brother

programme.title: Honeymoon From Hell
programme.desc: Horror. On her honeymoon, a woman learns a girl who died of a broken heart haunts the bed and breakfast that she and her husband are staying in. When a hurricane strands them at the house, she learns the legends about the ghost are all too real

programme.title: Nerve
programme.desc: Thriller with Emma Roberts. Vee Delmonico, a high school senior is pressured into joining the popular online game of truth or dare. She soon finds herself caught up in the competition which requires her to perform stunts that ultimately will determine her entire future

programme.title: Renegades
programme.desc: Action with J.K. Simmons. In the war-torn Bosnian capital of Sarajevo, US Navy Seal Matt Barnes leads a band of renegades on a covert operation to rescue treasure from the bottom of a lake

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller concerning a maverick New Orleans-based ATF agent (Denzel Washington) who is brought in on a top-secret government program to catch the terrorist responsible for a ferry bombing that kills hundreds. Paula Patton, Val Kilmer, Jim Caviezel co-star

programme.title: Romeo Is Bleeding
programme.desc: Thriller starring Gary Oldman, Lena Olin and Annabella Sciorra. A corrupt cop who betrays mob witnesses bites off more than he can chew when he attempts to assassinate a beautiful but ruthless Russian-born hit woman

programme.title: Thursday
programme.desc: A man with a past finds himself again embroiled in sordid goings-on when an old friend shows up at his house with a large amount of heroin. Action starring Thomas Jane and Aaron Eckhart

programme.title: Beyond The Edge
programme.desc: Action and adventure starring Lyubov Aksyonova and Antonio Banderas. Contemporary Moscow. A talented gambler gathers a team of people with supernatural powers to win big at a casino. But they find a much stronger mystical rival

programme.title: Enter The Warrior's Gate
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure meets martial arts action. A teenage gamer is transported to a fantasy world, where he is mistaken for his video-game alter ego, a legendary hero. Soon, he sets out to rescue a kidnapped princess from the clutches of a cruel warlord

programme.title: Resident Evil: Vendetta
programme.desc: Animation. BSAA Chris Redfield enlists the help of government agent Leon S. Kennedy and Professor Rebecca Chambers from Alexander Institute of Biotechnology to stop a death merchant with a vengeance from spreading a deadly virus in New York

programme.title: Beast Of Burden
programme.desc: Action and crime. Sean Haggerty only has an hour to deliver his illegal cargo. An hour to reassure a drug cartel, a hitman, and the DEA that nothing is wrong. An hour to make sure his wife survives. And he must do it all from the cockpit of his Cessna

programme.title: Patient Zero
programme.desc: Horror and action. After an unprecedented global pandemic turns the majority of humankind into violent "Infected," a man gifted with the ability to speak the Infected's new language leads the last survivors on a hunt for Patient Zero and a cure

programme.title: Body Of Sin
programme.desc: Adventure. When two women who use seduction to steal from men discover that one of their victims is hiding millions in diamonds, the score of their lives becomes a run for their lives

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Peter Paul and David Paul. Identical twin brothers on both sides of the law - one's a cop, the other is a criminal - work together when an unrepentant villain tries to frame them for murder as he tries to get his hands on a huge stash of diamonds

programme.title: Against The Ropes
programme.desc: Based on the real-life story of Jackie Kallen (Meg Ryan), a Jewish woman from Detroit who became a successful boxing manager by believing in the fighting skills of Luther Shaw (Omar Epps)

programme.title: The Hollow Point
programme.desc: Thriller with Patrick Wilson and Lynn Collins. A retired lawman works with a new sheriff when a botched Mexican drug deal and a vicious hit man threaten their border town

programme.title: Chokehold
programme.desc: Action. Story of a woman who seeks revenge on the Russian Mob for the death of her father. She battles her way up in the underground mixed martial arts fighting world to find those responsible and avenge his death

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: Fantasy action with Christian Bale and Matthew McConaughey. A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth wreaking havoc across the globe, torching civilization and turning humans into an endangered species

programme.title: SuperBob
programme.desc: Action comedy, Brett Goldstein, Catherine Tate, Natalia Tena. Robert Kenner, a mild mannered postman from London was struck by a meteor which bestowed him with super powers. Today, Bob is an overworked under-appreciated civil servant who has his first date in six years

programme.title: Shooting For Socrates
programme.desc: Comedy drama set in Belfast against the backdrop of the 1986 World Cup. It tells the story of a momentous time in Northern Ireland's football history through the eyes of players, fans and the media, following the lives of passionate supporters Arthur and Tommy

programme.title: A Quiet Passion
programme.desc: A biographical drama detailing the life of 19th century American poet Emily Dickinson (Cynthia Nixon), from her early days as a young schoolgirl to her later years as a reclusive, unrecognized artist

programme.title: Viceroy's House
programme.desc: Drama with Gillian Anderson. In 1947, Lord Mountbatten assumes the post of last Viceroy, charged with handing India back to its people, living upstairs at the house which was the home of British rulers, whilst 500 Hindu, Muslim and Sikh servants lived downstairs

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young man named Tristan tries to win the heart of the beautiful Victoria by venturing into the magical realm to retrieve a fallen star. Adventure starring Michelle Pfeiffer

programme.title: Judy Moody And The Not Bummer Summer
programme.desc: Family-friendly adventure that finds mischievous third grader Judy Moody experiencing a summer she'll never forget. Jordana Beatty, Heather Graham and Parris Mosteller star

programme.title: Fluke
programme.desc: Drama. Tom (Matthew Modine), a workaholic, all but ignores his family. Tom's perspective changes when he dies in a car accident and is reincarnated as Fluke, a big brown dog. Fluke attempts to reconnect with his wife and son, but gets lost trying to make his way home

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: Action with Lucas Till and Jane Levy. Tripp builds a Monster Truck from scrapped cars. After an accident at a nearby oil-drilling site displaces a strange a subterranean creature, he may have just found the key to getting out of town and a most unlikely friend

programme.title: RV
programme.desc: An overworked executive Bob Munro persuades his wife and children to give up their Hawaiian vacation for some 'family bonding' on a cross-country RV trip. Family adventure starring Robin Williams

programme.title: War For The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: Action Adventure starring Andy Serkis and Judy Greer. After the apes suffer unimaginable losses, Caesar wrestles with his darker instincts and begins his own mythic quest to avenge his kind

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Musical comedy. Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson, Hailee Steinfeld. After the highs of winning the World Championships, the now separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition overseas to make music, and some questionable decisions

programme.title: Hustle And Flow
programme.desc: With help from his friends, a Memphis pimp in a mid-life crisis attempts to become a successful rapper. Drama with Terrence Howard and Anthony Anderson

programme.title: Hustle And Flow
programme.desc: With help from his friends, a Memphis pimp in a mid-life crisis attempts to become a successful rapper. Drama with Terrence Howard and Anthony Anderson

programme.title: Moulin Rouge!
programme.desc: A romantic musical based on Verdi's La Traviata, telling the story of a young poet/writer (Ewan McGregor) who falls in love with the terminally-ill cabaret actress and courtesan of the Moulin Rouge (Nicole Kidman)

programme.title: Monster Trucks

programme.title: The Pirates! Band Of Misfits
programme.desc: Family animation. Set sail for a fun-filled voyage with the biggest Band of Misfits on the seven seas! When the infamous Pirate Captain is shunned once again by his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz, he sets his sights on winning the coveted Pirate of the Year Award!

programme.title: Junior
programme.desc: A male scientist must become pregnant in order to test a new fertility drug. Comedy starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Danny DeVito

programme.title: What About Bob?
programme.desc: A successful psychiatrist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients tracks him down during his family vacation. Comedy starring Bill Murray and Richard Dreyfuss

programme.title: The Water Horse: Legend Of The Deep
programme.desc: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend. Family adventure starring Bruce Allpress and Geraldine Brophy

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Drama and thriller starring Mark Wahlberg, Kurt Russell and John Malkovich. A story set on the offshore drilling rig Deepwater Horizon, which exploded during April 2010 and created the worst oil spill in U.S. history

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Action thriller, Matt Damon, Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander. The former CIA assassin resurfaces, teaming up with a former operative to uncover the truth behind his father's death while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail

programme.title: Armored
programme.desc: Crime thriller with Matt Dillon. A rookie guard is coerced by his co-workers to steal an armoured truck containing $42 million but things start to unravel when one of them kills a homeless man as they stash the cash

programme.title: The Firm
programme.desc: Mitch is a much sought after young graduate. When he's made an excellent offer by a small law firm in Memphis, he and his wife are elated. Very soon Mitch becomes worried about The Firm's clients.. Starring Tom Cruise

programme.desc: An 18-year-old basketball star who is being recruited by Cornell University seems to have it all figured out: captain of his team, a good student, a longtime girlfriend and good friends. But at home he's struggling with his troubled father who has a gambling addiction

programme.title: What About Bob?

programme.title: Dare To Be Wild

programme.title: The Producers

programme.title: The Great Wall

programme.title: The Messengers

programme.title: The Rezort
programme.desc: Horror. After a zombie outbreak, adventure seekers are invited to a luxury island resort where they can hunt the mindless undead on safari

programme.title: 47 Meters Down

programme.title: Somnus

programme.title: Beverly Hills Chihuahua 2
programme.desc: Family comedy. When Chloe gives birth to a litter of pups, Papi works hard to adjust to the rigors of parenthood. Later, the little ones set out on a mission of their own and land up in the middle of a bank robbery

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: Family comedy. Isabel has recently lost her parents in a car accident. Feeling very alone and friendless in a new town, Isabel befriends a stray robot dog named ARCHIE. Though he looks like a normal dog, he is anything but

programme.title: Hotel For Dogs
programme.desc: Family comedy. Animals are strictly forbidden at Andi and Bruce's foster home but for Friday, the adorable dog they secretly care for and all the other neighbourhood strays they find, they're ready to risk everything

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: Comedy. A TV weatherman (Bill Murray) covering the annual Pennsylvania Groundhog Day finds himself in a time loop, repeating the same day again and again. After indulging in hedonism and committing suicide numerous times, he begins to re-examine his life and priorities

programme.title: 28 Days
programme.desc: After causing a car accident while drunk, Gwen is given a stark choice by a judge - go into a rehab centre or go to jail! Comedy drama with Sandra Bullock

programme.desc: Following the same premise as the past movies, Johnny Knoxville, Bam Margera, Chris Pontius, Steve-O and the rest of the gang perform painful stunts and practical jokes that stretch the boundaries of good taste

programme.title: Overlord
programme.desc: Thriller. On the eve of D-Day, a team of American paratroopers drop into Nazi-occupied France to penetrate the walls of a fortified church. In a mysterious lab beneath the church, the outnumbered G.I's come face-to-face with enemies unlike any the world has ever seen

programme.title: Columbus
programme.desc: A Korean-born man finds himself stuck in Columbus, Indiana, where his architect father is in a coma. The man meets a young woman who wants to stay in Columbus with her mother, a recovering addict, instead of pursuing her own dreams

programme.title: A Boy Called Po
programme.desc: Drama. After his wife's death, an overworked engineer struggles to care for his son with autism, who regresses into a fantasy world to escape real-life bullying

programme.title: Avengers: Infinity War
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Robert Downey Jr, Chris Hemsworth and Scarlett Johansson. The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe

programme.title: Hope Dances
programme.desc: Family. A young sports-loving ballerina, who has a chance to secure the lead role in "The Nutcracker

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Action sci-fi. Several months after the events of Captain America: Civil War, Peter Parker, with the help of his mentor Tony Stark, tries to balance his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens, while fighting a new threat, the Vulture

programme.title: Mission Possible
programme.desc: Adventure and comedy. A group of kids, a Shih tzu dog, a wood, a vet, a police officer with his team and the typical gang of bad guys will be the main characters of a funny action movie. ...Without forgetting that there will be almost 30 Shih tzu dogs!!

programme.title: We Love You, Sally Carmichael
programme.desc: Comedy. Simon Hayes, an author, is ashamed to have written a series of romance novels under the pen name, Sally Carmichael. When Simon is forced to meet a top box office star, his carefully built life of anonymity starts crumbling down around him

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Death Cure
programme.desc: Action and Sci-Fi starring Dylan O'Brien and Kaya Scodelario. Young hero Thomas embarks on a mission to find a cure for a deadly disease known as "The Flare"

programme.title: OSN Special Oscars Red Carpet Coverage 2019
programme.desc: Follow OSN's special reporters Carole Yammine and Kris Fade as they talk exclusively with the biggest Hollywood superstars gracing the Red Carpet of the prestigious 91st Academy Awards

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: When an attack on the Kingsman headquarters takes place and a new villain rises, Eggsy and Merlin are forced to work together with the American agency known as the Statesman to save the world

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: PREMIERE. Action, Dwayne Johnson, Neve Campbell. Framed and on the run, Will Sawyer, a former FBI agent, must save his family from a blazing fire in the world's tallest building, clear his name and find the truth behind the attack on the Hong Kong skyscraper

programme.title: Accident Man
programme.desc: Action and crime starring Scott Adkins and Ashley Greene. Mike Fallon, the Accident Man, is a stone cold killer. When a loved one is murdered by his own crew, Fallon is forced to avenge the one person who actually meant something to him

programme.title: Goodbye Christopher Robin
programme.desc: Biographical drama. After leaving London for the English countryside, writer A.A. Milne starts to spin fanciful yarns about his son's growing collection of stuffed animals. These stories form the basis for "Winnie-the-Pooh" published in 1926

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2
programme.desc: Comedy. Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg. Dusty and Brad join forces to make Christmastime perfect for the children. Their newfound partnership soon gets put to the test when their intrusive fathers arrive to turn the holiday upside down. Mel Gibson, John Lithgow also star

programme.title: The Mountain Between Us
programme.desc: Action and Adventure starring Idris Elba and Kate Winslet .Stranded after a tragic plane crash, two strangers must forge a connection to survive the extreme elements of a remote snow covered mountain

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Drama. Jamie Dornan and Dakota Johnson return as Christian Grey and Anastasia Steele. Believing they have left behind shadowy figures from their past as they step into their roles as Mr. and Mrs. Grey, new threats jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins

programme.title: The Glass Castle
programme.desc: Biography. Brie Larsson, Woody Harrelson, Naomi Watts. A young girl comes of age in a dysfunctional family of nonconformist nomads with a mother who's an eccentric artist and an alcoholic father who distracts her with magical stories

programme.title: Runaway Romance
programme.desc: Drama. Reality TV star Ann Stanway (Danielle C. Ryan) leaves Hollywood and finds herself in an Amish country where she discovers friendship, new love and ultimately herself. She must decide between staying in her newfound reality or returning to her old one

programme.desc: Biographical drama. After leaving London for the English countryside, writer A.A. Milne starts to spin fanciful yarns about his son's growing collection of stuffed animals. These stories form the basis for "Winnie-the-Pooh" published in 1926

programme.title: I Can Only Imagine
programme.desc: Biographical drama with Dennis Quaid. Growing up in Texas, Bart Millard suffers physical and emotional abuse at the hands of his father. His tough upbringing inspires him to write the hit song "I Can Only Imagine" as singer of the band MercyMe

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Dearly Depotted
programme.desc: Crime drama. Abby Knight, ex-lawyer, crime buff and owner of Bloomers Flower Shop, is having a week to be reckoned with. A reluctant bridesmaid at a wedding, Abby ends up not just doing the flowers, but having to find out who murdered a wedding crasher

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2
programme.desc: Comedy. Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg. Dusty and Brad join forces to make Christmastime perfect for the children. Their newfound partnership soon gets put to the test when their intrusive fathers arrive to turn the holiday upside down. Mel Gibson, John Lithgow also star

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: Animation and Comedy. Gene, a multi-expressional emoji, sets out on a journey to become a normal emoji

programme.title: Masterminds
programme.desc: Comedy with Zach Galafinakis and Owen Wilson. A night guard at an armored car company in the Southern U.S. organizes one of the biggest bank heists in American history

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares to do battle with the First Order

programme.title: Kodachrome
programme.desc: Drama based on A.G. Sulzberger's 2010 New York Times article about a father (Ed Harris) and son (Jason Sudeikis) who take a road trip to Kansas in order to to develop photographs at Kodak's last Kodachrome lab before it closes its doors forever

programme.title: American Made
programme.desc: Comedy. Barry Seal (Tom Cruise), a TWA pilot, is recruited by the CIA to provide reconnaissance on the burgeoning communist threat in Central America and soon finds himself in charge of one of the biggest covert CIA operations in the history of the USA

programme.title: American Made
programme.desc: Comedy. Barry Seal (Tom Cruise), a TWA pilot, is recruited by the CIA to provide reconnaissance on the burgeoning communist threat in Central America and soon finds himself in charge of one of the biggest covert CIA operations in the history of the USA

programme.title: The Last Word
programme.desc: Comedy drama with Shirley Maclaine and Amanda Seyfried. Harriett is a retired businesswoman who tries to control everything around her. When she decides to write her own obituary, a young journalist takes up the task of finding out the truth

programme.desc: Drama starring Erin Moriarty and William Hurt. After the tragic death of star volleyball player Caroline "Line" Found, a team of dispirited high school girls must band together under the guidance of their tough-love coach in hopes of winning the state championship

programme.desc: Drama. Ralph, a once-famous screenwriter, is in his seventies and terminally ill tries to reconcile with his son. When the man he hires to painlessly end his life double crosses him, he is given a second chance to right his wrongs before he passes

programme.desc: Drama based on A.G. Sulzberger's 2010 New York Times article about a father (Ed Harris) and son (Jason Sudeikis) who take a road trip to Kansas in order to to develop photographs at Kodak's last Kodachrome lab before it closes its doors forever

programme.title: American Made
programme.desc: Comedy. Barry Seal (Tom Cruise), a TWA pilot, is recruited by the CIA to provide reconnaissance on the burgeoning communist threat in Central America and soon finds himself in charge of one of the biggest covert CIA operations in the history of the USA

programme.title: The Last Word
programme.desc: Comedy drama with Shirley Maclaine and Amanda Seyfried. Harriett is a retired businesswoman who tries to control everything around her. When she decides to write her own obituary, a young journalist takes up the task of finding out the truth

programme.title: I Can Only Imagine
programme.desc: Biographical drama with Dennis Quaid. Growing up in Texas, Bart Millard suffers physical and emotional abuse at the hands of his father. His tough upbringing inspires him to write the hit song "I Can Only Imagine" as singer of the band MercyMe

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Dearly Depotted
programme.desc: Crime drama. Abby Knight, ex-lawyer, crime buff and owner of Bloomers Flower Shop, is having a week to be reckoned with. A reluctant bridesmaid at a wedding, Abby ends up not just doing the flowers, but having to find out who murdered a wedding crasher

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: Animation and Comedy. Gene, a multi-expressional emoji, sets out on a journey to become a normal emoji

programme.title: The Breadwinner
programme.desc: This animated feature set in Kabul follows a young girl named Parvana who must cut off her hair and disguise herself as a boy to become the breadwinner for her family when her father is imprisoned

programme.title: Masterminds
programme.desc: Comedy with Zach Galafinakis and Owen Wilson. A night guard at an armored car company in the Southern U.S. organizes one of the biggest bank heists in American history

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares to do battle with the First Order

programme.title: Tad, The Lost Explorer And The Secret Of King Mida
programme.desc: Kids animation. Tad Jones, the most awkward explorer, must rescue his beloved Sara from a millionaire who is looking for King Midas' necklace

programme.title: The Miracle Season
programme.desc: Drama starring Erin Moriarty and William Hurt. After the tragic death of star volleyball player Caroline "Line" Found, a team of dispirited high school girls must band together under the guidance of their tough-love coach in hopes of winning the state championship

programme.title: That Good Night
programme.desc: Drama. Ralph, a once-famous screenwriter, is in his seventies and terminally ill tries to reconcile with his son. When the man he hires to painlessly end his life double crosses him, he is given a second chance to right his wrongs before he passes

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum is hired by a woman to prove that her son didn't kill his girlfriend and has only 24 hours to do so before the accused accepts a plea deal. Also, Rick and TC try to recover stolen appliances that were donated to a wounded veteran

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An airline pilot accuses her captain of sexual assault, so Barba convenes a grand jury to determine their employer's complicity in the crime. Fin ensures that Benson is protected at work

programme.title: Good Morning America
programme.desc: Broadcasting from the ABC studios in New York, this Emmy award-winning news show brings viewers daily, up-to-the-minute breaking news and weather, as well as topical feature stories

programme.title: The View
programme.desc: Emmy award winner for "Outstanding Talk Show" this chat-fest features a team of dynamic women of different ages, experiences and backgrounds discussing the most topical events of the day

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: SWAT struggles to maintain peace on the eve of a Los Angeles LGBTQ pride festival after a hate crime sparks citywide anger that ignites further violence. As Chris grows anxious for her fellow LGBTQ community members, Commander Hicks is reunited with his estranged son

programme.title: Harrow
programme.desc: A woman's dismembered body is found on a railway track. Although suicide is suspected, Harrow is not so sure. Meanwhile, the river bones are returned, much to Harrow's dismay, and his troubles are only increased when Dass begins questioning him about Robert Quinn

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An airline pilot accuses her captain of sexual assault, so Barba convenes a grand jury to determine their employer's complicity in the crime. Fin ensures that Benson is protected at work

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: Christina Hart takes a solo mission to track down the mentor who betrayed her, and the team tries to locate her before it's too late

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum is hired by a woman to prove that her son didn't kill his girlfriend and has only 24 hours to do so before the accused accepts a plea deal. Also, Rick and TC try to recover stolen appliances that were donated to a wounded veteran

programme.title: Lethal Weapon
programme.desc: When Cole is investigated by the FBI, Murtaugh is forced to question his loyalty to his own partner. Meanwhile, Cole works a case that puts Natalie's fiance, Andrew, into the crosshairs right before their wedding day

programme.title: The View
programme.desc: Emmy award winner for "Outstanding Talk Show" this chat-fest features a team of dynamic women of different ages, experiences and backgrounds discussing the most topical events of the day

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Barba must put their political beliefs aside when a female pundit is assaulted during a protest

programme.title: Live Good Morning America
programme.desc: Broadcasting live from the ABC studios in New York, this Emmy award-winning news show brings viewers daily, up-to-the-minute breaking news and weather, as well as topical feature stories

programme.title: Harrow
programme.desc: Dass and Nichols are closing in on the truth with the discovery of Quinn's car. Meanwhile, Harrow investigates the death of a mother and son in a head-on collision

programme.title: Live Good Morning America
programme.desc: Broadcasting live from the ABC studios in New York, this Emmy award-winning news show brings viewers daily, up-to-the-minute breaking news and weather, as well as topical feature stories

programme.title: Harrow
programme.desc: A dead man wakes up on Harrow's autopsy table and promptly takes him hostage. Meanwhile, Dass pieces together clues from Quinn's murder and uncovers evidence that Harrow destroyed evidence, proof he was covering his tracks

programme.title: Suits
programme.desc: An old foe backs the firm into a corner. Samantha and Alex try to broker a peace between clients

programme.title: The Good Doctor
programme.desc: New chief of surgery Dr. Jackson Han believes Dr. Shaun Murphy is a liability more than an asset and works to keep him out of the operating room permanently

programme.title: New Amsterdam
programme.desc: As Max begins his treatment, he realises that it may slow him down faster than he originally thought. Meanwhile, Reynolds must deal with an incident from his past when a reporter comes to the hospital, and Sharpe and Bloom continue a contentious conversation

programme.title: This Is Us
programme.desc: Randall's campaign comes to a close; Kevin meets someone from Zoe's past; Kate and Toby get ready for the baby

programme.title: The Sinner
programme.desc: Ambrose and Heather begin to unravel where Julian is from, as Julian is thrust into a new world

programme.title: C.B. Strike
programme.desc: Robin gets key information from a salesgirl at the boutique Lula visited. Strike arrives just as Robin tries on a stunning green dress and he awkwardly averts his eyes as he explains his CCTV breakthrough - that a man left Lula's wearing a Guy Some hoodie

programme.title: Wyatt Cenac's Problem Areas
programme.desc: Wyatt explores NRA propaganda at the movies, ponders dogs eating chicken bones, and travels to Birmingham to learn about police apologies

programme.title: Flight Of The Conchords
programme.desc: Bret organises a gang to protect himself from rappers he dissed in a song. Murray and Jemaine confront a group of Aussie bullies, while Mel paints a portrait Jemaine can't get rid of

programme.title: Teamster Boss: The Jackie Presser Story
programme.desc: Biographical drama about Jackie Presser (Brian Dennehy), president of the Teamsters. Like his predecessor, Jimmy Hoffa, Presser was caught between the Mafia, the FBI, and his own ambitions, as well as all the trials and tribulations that arose during his rise to power

programme.title: On Freddie Roach
programme.desc: Series chronicling the daily activities of celebrated boxing trainer & International Hall of Fame inductee Freddie Roach as he works with elite fighters at his Wild Card Boxing Club, Hollywood, CA, all while fighting an ailment very likely linked to his own boxing past

programme.title: Soul Of The Game
programme.desc: Historical docudrama recounting the rivalry in the mid-'40s between Jackie Robinson, Satchel Paige and Josh Gibson to see who would be the first African-American to play Major League Baseball. Delroy Lindo, Mykelti Williamson and Blair Underwood star

programme.title: Wit
programme.desc: Drama starring Emma Thompson, Christopher Lloyd, Eileen Atkins. A college professor learns she has advanced ovarian cancer and only a short time to live, which gives her a sudden and dramatic insight into the importance of kindness and compassion

programme.title: David McCullough: Painting With Words
programme.desc: Produced by Tom Hanks and Gary Goetzman, this documentary paints an affectionate, first-person portrait of David McCullough, author of the Pulitzer Prize-winning biography that inspired HBO's recent John Adams miniseries

programme.title: State Of Play: Culture Shock
programme.desc: This documentary explores how the NFL, America's most popular sports organisation, is confronting the enormous challenge of making the game safer, chronicling the physical toll of the game on its players - a subject that has taken centre stage in recent years

programme.title: Brazil, The Great Leap Backwards
programme.desc: Between democracy and government graft, this film explores the situation of a country where the powerful and partisan media seems to have confiscated the people's voice, and unearths the dream of a Brazil that could reinvent itself as a model for the whole continent

programme.title: The Tears Of Sichuan Province
programme.desc: The 2008 Sichuan earthquake killed around 70,000 people - of which 10,000 were children. This documentary focuses on the aftermath and grieving families and communities of the children, as they mourn their loss and question the government over construction standards

programme.title: Love Child
programme.desc: 2010, a South Korean baby died of malnutrition because her parents were playing games online. Ordinarily this would be a clear case of negligence, but this documentary looks at the way South Korea's Internet infrastructure has adversely affected its communal society

programme.title: Soufra
programme.desc: The story of intrepid social entrepreneur Mariam Shaar - a generational refugee who has spent her entire life in the Burj El Barajneh refugee camp just south of Beirut, Lebanon - who set out against all odds to change her fate by launching a successful catering company

programme.title: Trophy
programme.desc: This in-depth look into the powerhouse industries of big-game hunting, breeding and wildlife conservation in the U.S. and Africa unravels the complex consequences of treating animals as commodities

programme.title: We'll Meet Again
programme.desc: Join Ann Curry for the dramatic reunions of people who lost touch after the civil rights movement. Fatima hopes to thank Thelma for her courage in the face of racism, and Sherie searches for the friend who inspired her commitment to social justice

programme.title: For Neda
programme.desc: June 20th, 2009, Neda Agha-Soltan became another tragic casualty in the Iranian protests following the recent presidential election results. Unlike many of the unknown victims, she instantly became a worldwide symbol of the struggle. This documentary tells Neda's story

programme.title: I Am An Animal
programme.desc: Documentary. A candid and introspective look at the extreme beliefs and motives of Ingrid Newkirk, the British-born co-founder and driving force behind People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA), the world's largest animal-rights organization

programme.title: I Am An Animal
programme.desc: Documentary. A candid and introspective look at the extreme beliefs and motives of Ingrid Newkirk, the British-born co-founder and driving force behind People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA), the world's largest animal-rights organization

programme.title: Triangle: Remembering The Fire
programme.desc: In March 1911, a catastrophic fire broke out at the Triangle Waist Company in NYC. Trapped inside the ten-story building, 146 workers were burned alive or forced to jump to their deaths to escape an inferno that consumed the factory in just 18 minutes

programme.title: Sharp Objects
programme.desc: Concerned for the safety of Amma, Camille puts her own life in jeopardy as she gets closer to the truth behind the shocking mysteries surrounding the Wind Gap killings

programme.title: Tell Me You Love Me
programme.desc: May offers up a novel idea for David and Katie to save their marriage. Coming to terms with their infertility, Palek makes a revelation to Carolyn. Later, Carolyn steps up her effort to be made partner at her law firm, and Palek decides to put their house on the market

programme.title: We'll Meet Again
programme.desc: Join Ann Curry for the dramatic reunions of people who lost touch after the civil rights movement. Fatima hopes to thank Thelma for her courage in the face of racism, and Sherie searches for the friend who inspired her commitment to social justice

programme.title: Ricochet
programme.desc: Crime thriller, Denzel Washington, John Lithgow, Ice-T. A psychotic hit man escapes from prison with plans to exact brutal & well-calculated revenge on the then rookie Los Angeles police officer, now Assistant District Attorney, who arrested him some eight years before

programme.title: The Life And Death Of Peter Sellers
programme.desc: Biographical drama about Sellers' turbulent rise from BBC radio performer to one of the world's most gifted comedic actors who struggled to reconcile his relationship with women, his celebrity status and his many selves. Geoffrey Rush, Charlize Theron, Emily Watson

programme.title: Wit
programme.desc: Drama starring Emma Thompson, Christopher Lloyd, Eileen Atkins. A college professor learns she has advanced ovarian cancer and only a short time to live, which gives her a sudden and dramatic insight into the importance of kindness and compassion

programme.title: State Of Play: Culture Shock
programme.desc: This documentary explores how the NFL, America's most popular sports organisation, is confronting the enormous challenge of making the game safer, chronicling the physical toll of the game on its players - a subject that has taken centre stage in recent years

programme.title: Bury My Heart At Wounded Knee
programme.desc: Based on the book by Dee Brown, director Yves Simoneau explores the plight of the American Indian in the later half of the 19th century in this docudrama exploring the effects of westward expansion. Aidan Quinn, Adam Beach, August Schellenberg star

programme.title: Questioning Darwin
programme.desc: This documentary reveals Charles Darwin's internal struggle as he grappled with the implications of his theory of natural selection, and explores the thinking behind modern-day Creationist theory and those who refute evolution

programme.title: Child Labor In Bolivia, The Broken Taboo
programme.desc: Nowadays in Bolivia, children as young as 10 are legally at work. Should it be banned, thus denying a country's social reality? Should it be acknowledged as a way to provide children protection? Will Bolivia's example become a source of inspiration for other countries?

programme.title: Date My Race
programme.desc: Documentary. Natalie Jane, online dating coach and founder of eDateMate provides tips and advice on online dating profiles and in the broader context of how your race plays a part in selecting a partner

programme.title: San Francisco 2.0
programme.desc: Acclaimed filmmaker Alexandra Pelosi's documentary takes a look at the future of San Francisco, where the invasion of the tech elite is causing economic divisions and upheaval in a city that has long been the counter-culture capital of the U.S

programme.title: How To Build A Human
programme.desc: A documentary exploring the latest developments in artificial intelligence, actress Gemma Chan (Humans) meets experts in robotics and computer programming from around the world, and visits a project attempting to create a computer more powerful than the human brain

programme.title: The Truth About Killer Robots
programme.desc: This documentary takes a timely and often-unnerving look at the growing dangers that are emerging as automation becomes a greater part of everyday life around the world

programme.title: Bright Lights: Debbie Reynolds & Carrier Fisher
programme.desc: The story of a family's complicated love, this documentary is an intimate portrait of Hollywood royalty in all its eccentricity - Carrie Fisher and her mother, Debbie Reynolds. Featuring vintage family films that bring iconic old-world Hollywood to life

programme.title: The Sisters
programme.desc: The compelling story of twin sisters Cristina and Bella Santiago whose relationship is put to the test with the consequences of their personal choices and the obstacles that fate brings their way

programme.title: Vice Special Report: Fighting ISIS
programme.desc: A first-hand understanding of the rise of the terrorist group and what options the world has to end its reign. Correspondent Ben Anderson embeds with Iraqi fighters and heads to the front lines where Sunni, Shiite and Kurdish forces are fighting for their lives

programme.title: The Traffickers
programme.desc: Nelufar Hedayat investigates the rise of the Pangolin as a rare and expensive exotic food source

programme.title: Billy Crystal Live - 700 Sundays
programme.desc: Adapted from his Tony Award-winning stage production, Crystal's one-man show is an autobiographical journey of the characters who have influenced him throughout his life - from childhood, growing up in the jazz world of Manhattan, to his teens and, finally, adulthood

programme.title: Last Days
programme.desc: Drama directed by Gus Van Sant. Loosely based on the life of Kurt Cobain, this is the story of Blake (Michael Pitt), lead singer in a successful rock band and idolised by millions, but so riddled with self-doubt and anxiety that tragedy looms large

programme.title: The Sisters
programme.desc: Hundreds of European women & girls are leaving their homes to join Islamic extremists fighting on the Syrian-Iraqi front. This expose into the phenomenon of female jihadists is the result of a painstaking investigation to understand how young women end up joining ISIS

programme.title: All The Way
programme.desc: Biopic. A look at President Lyndon B. Johnson's (Bryan Cranston) first year in office as Johnson finds himself caught between the moral imperative of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. and the expectations of the southern Democratic Party leaders who brought him to power

programme.title: Bury My Heart At Wounded Knee
programme.desc: Based on the book by Dee Brown, director Yves Simoneau explores the plight of the American Indian in the later half of the 19th century in this docudrama exploring the effects of westward expansion. Aidan Quinn, Adam Beach, August Schellenberg star

programme.title: Lady Day At Emerson's Bar & Grill
programme.desc: Filmed before a live audience in New Orleans, Lady Day at Emerson's Bar and Grill features Tony Award winner Audra McDonald in her history-making, tour de force performance as the jazz icon Billie Holiday - telling her life story through the songs that made her famous

programme.title: Lackawanna Blues
programme.desc: Based on the award winning play by Ruben Santiago-Hudson, this poignant and colourful drama tells the inspirational story of a courageous woman whose spirit and strength served as the foundation for a struggling community trying to survive during the segregation era

programme.title: Dying To Be Perfect
programme.desc: A respected athlete and the wife of a successful politician, this drama documents Ellen Hart Pena's (Crystal Bernard) struggle to conquer the eating disorder bulimia, as well as overcome the poor self-image that led her to starve herself. Esai Morales co-stars

programme.title: The Fever
programme.desc: Drama. A bourgeois woman (Vanessa Redgrave) awakens suffering from a particularly intense fever and trapped in an unidentified third-world country. Venturing out into her war-torn surroundings, the once-wealthy woman is forced to contend with unfamiliar issues

programme.title: HBO Documentary
programme.desc: 80% of Americans associate dyslexia with mental retardation, but what are the realities of this common learning disability? This film examines the complexities of the dyslexic brain, showing how it is structured differently while debunking myths and misperceptions

programme.title: Einstein And Eddington
programme.desc: Drama starring Andy Serkis, David Tennant, Richard McCabe. The story of Albert Einstein's general theory of relativity, his relationship with Astrophysicist Arthur Eddington, and the introduction of this theory to the world against the backdrop of the Great War

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Bob Lee and Isaac are put through the wringer by a former member of Earl's top secret Vietnam unit; Julie stands up to the Bama family; Nadine gains entry into a high tech security facility

programme.title: Flight Of The Conchords
programme.desc: Murray tries to elevate Bret and Jemaine on his friendship graph, bringing his questioning pal Jim in on the plan. Mel demands an apology from Bret for inappropriate dream behaviour

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: One year after losing the presidency, Selina attempts to secure her legacy. Dan tries to ingratiate himself at his new job whereas Amy's brash D.C.-style personality proves too much for her new co-workers

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: After hearing Logan's plan to expand to local TV, Kendall plots a vote of no confidence against his father. Greg drives his ornery grandfather from Canada to New York for a Thanksgiving reunion with Logan. Tom grows concerned about the terms of his prenup with Shiv

programme.title: Sunshine Kings
programme.desc: The arrival of a talent scout convinces Eddie that he must face up to the mistake from his past in order to heal the wounded Jacob. In seeking to prevent Jacob's unjust charge and conviction, Zara helps to bring down the person responsible for Elly's near-fatal injury

programme.title: Mildred Pierce
programme.desc: After throwing her cheating husband out of the house, a young mother named Mildred Pierce tries to find suitable work in Depression-era California

programme.title: 2 Dope Queens
programme.desc: Jessica and Phoebe are joined onstage by Janet Mock, who talks about Ball Culture and her favourite music artists, and Lizzo, who teaches the Queens to play the flute

programme.title: The Handmaid's Tale
programme.desc: Offred is sent to a familiar place; Nick is rocked by Gilead's brutal response to a crime; Emily is assigned to a mysterious new house

programme.title: Carnivale
programme.desc: Samson sends Ben on a road trip to enlist a new attraction, where he encounters long-time carney rival Phineas Boffo. Meanwhile, while Brother Justin is receiving treatments for 'religious excitation', Tommy Dolan is posing a rallying cry for his radio listeners

programme.title: Mildred Pierce
programme.desc: After throwing her cheating husband out of the house, a young mother named Mildred Pierce tries to find suitable work in Depression-era California

programme.title: Sunshine Kings
programme.desc: The arrival of a talent scout convinces Eddie that he must face up to the mistake from his past in order to heal the wounded Jacob. In seeking to prevent Jacob's unjust charge and conviction, Zara helps to bring down the person responsible for Elly's near-fatal injury

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: After hearing Logan's plan to expand to local TV, Kendall plots a vote of no confidence against his father. Greg drives his ornery grandfather from Canada to New York for a Thanksgiving reunion with Logan. Tom grows concerned about the terms of his prenup with Shiv

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: One year after losing the presidency, Selina attempts to secure her legacy. Dan tries to ingratiate himself at his new job whereas Amy's brash D.C.-style personality proves too much for her new co-workers

programme.title: Flight Of The Conchords
programme.desc: Murray tries to elevate Bret and Jemaine on his friendship graph, bringing his questioning pal Jim in on the plan. Mel demands an apology from Bret for inappropriate dream behaviour

programme.title: Einstein And Eddington
programme.desc: Drama starring Andy Serkis, David Tennant, Richard McCabe. The story of Albert Einstein's general theory of relativity, his relationship with Astrophysicist Arthur Eddington, and the introduction of this theory to the world against the backdrop of the Great War

programme.title: Dying To Be Perfect
programme.desc: A respected athlete and the wife of a successful politician, this drama documents Ellen Hart Pena's (Crystal Bernard) struggle to conquer the eating disorder bulimia, as well as overcome the poor self-image that led her to starve herself. Esai Morales co-stars

programme.title: The Fever
programme.desc: Drama. A bourgeois woman (Vanessa Redgrave) awakens suffering from a particularly intense fever and trapped in an unidentified third-world country. Venturing out into her war-torn surroundings, the once-wealthy woman is forced to contend with unfamiliar issues

programme.title: HBO Documentary
programme.desc: 80% of Americans associate dyslexia with mental retardation, but what are the realities of this common learning disability? This film examines the complexities of the dyslexic brain, showing how it is structured differently while debunking myths and misperceptions

programme.title: Dancing In September
programme.desc: Drama, Nicole Ari Parker, Isaiah Washington. What happens when integrity and ambition collide in the volatile world of contemporary network TV? She's an idealistic writer hoping to sell a sitcom. He's an ambitious exec looking for a hit to energize his start-up network

programme.title: In Pursuit Of Honor
programme.desc: Western drama depicting the real-life story of five American Calvary soldiers who took a stand against General Douglas MacArthur and fought his 1930s plan to trade men on horses for tanks. Don Johnson, Craig Sheffer and Gabrielle Anwar star

programme.title: Elephant
programme.desc: Crime drama directed by Gus Van Sant. A portrayal of two days in the life of a suburban American high school where two cold and calculated misfit friends, Eric (Eric Deulen) and Alex (Alex Frost), are planning a Columbine-style massacre

programme.title: Ferrell Takes The Field
programme.desc: Documentary. On an epic single day, comedy superstar Will Ferrell travels to five different spring-training ballparks in Arizona, playing 10 different positions on 10 different major-league teams - all in a heroic effort to raise smiles, and funds for cancer

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Closing in on the mystery of his father's assassination, Bob Lee and Isaac track down a former "dark lord" of the Pentagon. Nadine, meanwhile, is sent on a dangerous mission by a DOJ Agent

programme.title: Flight Of The Conchords
programme.desc: Jemaine starts dating an Australian, to Bret's dismay and inconvenience

programme.title: Veep

programme.desc: Wyatt tries to make coal miners go solar, move millennials into battleships and understand community policing

programme.desc: Paris, the city of light, love and food is the adopted home of British writer and cook Harry Eastwood. In this series, Harry takes us on a journey through her home city, showing us how to create the mouthwatering delights that find their home in the city's patisseries

programme.title: Uprooted
programme.desc: The adventures of North American mum, Cordon Bleu-trained cook and enthusiastic food lover Sarah Sharratt as she navigates her way through a new life in rural France, experiencing as much of the culture, people and food as she can until she is "uprooted" somewhere new

programme.title: Top Chef Junior
programme.desc: All of the eliminations, the triumphs and the kitchen disasters...but with smaller-size chefs. This culinary reality show, hosted by Vanessa Lachey and with chef Curtis Stone as head judge, serves up some seriously entertaining cooking-based drama

programme.title: The Apartment
programme.desc: In its unmissable fourth season, The Apartment brings together twelve celebrities from all over the globe for a chance to win one hundred thousand dollars for a charity of their choice. The judging panel includes Jamie Durie, Andrea Savage and Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen

programme.title: Good Taste: South Asian
programme.desc: Classically trained Chef Aman Adatia explores the cultural cuisines of South Asia, while putting his own spin on fusion dishes and family favourites

programme.title: Next Stop
programme.desc: Join host and world travel expert Jon Olson as he visits amazing destinations around the globe and introduces you to the people, music, sport, activities and flavours that come together to define that region's personality and culture

programme.title: Sara's New Nordic Kitchen
programme.desc: Sara's New Nordic Kitchen shows us why food from this region is so much more than just pickled herring and rye bread. Let us introduce you to the purity and flavours of Scandinavia with Sara La Fountain

programme.title: Food Safari: Earth
programme.desc: Follow host Maeve O'Meara on an "access-all-areas" culinary globetrot across Australia. Each episode explores a new cuisine with the help of professional chefs and home cooks who show us their tips and secrets, cheat's recipes and classic favourites

programme.title: The Chef's Bar
programme.desc: A new, fresh cooking series that gives the audience a front row seat to an epic meal crafted by culinary stars, Craig Harding and Rob Rossi

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A rare 1589 book with the instructions for war and fortification is brought to the shop. Will Rick reinforce a good price, or will he protect his wallet?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: When a WWE Hall of Fame ring is up for grabs, will Rick pin down a deal or will he tap out? Then, Martha Washington brings home the bacon with a 1891 $1 silver certificate. Will Rick and Corey bankroll an offer or will they save it for a rainy day?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A 1906 Silver Half Dollar that belonged to a passenger on the Titanic sails into the shop, as well as a 1936 Zeiss 16mm camera

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: When an original Beach Boys surfboard rides into the shop, will Rick hang ten or will he have a gnarly wipe out? Later, things get psychedelic with an original Peter Max Statue of Liberty painting. Will Rick liberate a deal or will it get torched?

programme.title: Mountain Men

programme.title: Mountain Men

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: Morgan's big day goes bust when his plane breaks down; Mike's supply run across the bay leaves him high and dry; Tom takes on a rare high-value commission; and Jake's dog team hunts down two lions in a marathon high-speed chase

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: Morgan's hits bad weather on his first flight to the homestead; Mike fights icy currents and fading daylight to get supplies to his cabin; Tom runs a gauntlet in search of some late season fur; and Jason forges salvaged airplane parts into cutlery

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny continues his El Caminos love affair with a 1975 beauty. But if he's going to flip this ride for a big profit, the Count's Kustoms crew will have to put aside their differences

programme.title: Forged In Fire

programme.title: Forged In Fire
programme.desc: Three is the magic number as the bladesmiths are asked to forge three or more metals into a blade of their signature style. Despite pain and failure, two move on to the final round, returning home to forge a legendary spiked shield

programme.title: Forged In Fire
programme.desc: Four bladesmiths must salvage material from a car and forge a blade in a race against time. Only two will speed through to the final round, where they have five days to create a Viking sword

programme.desc: Four bladesmiths must forge high carbon steel and wrought iron into a fully functional weapon. Only two will move to the final round, where they have five days to create one of the most beautifully designed blades in history, the Ethiopian shotel

programme.title: Swamp People
programme.desc: After his worst start to alligator season ever, a desperate Troy does the unthinkable, bringing in outside help over the objections of his sons Jacob and Chase and his brother, Guy

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Will Rick and Chum like the sound of a Civil War drum brought into the shop? The bases are then loaded when an 1834 book with the original rules of baseball is up to bat

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Will Rick and Chum be all ears to a deal for a spy pen radio? Next, a Bruce Springsteen tour jacket rocks into the shop

programme.title: Ozzy And Jack's World Detour
programme.desc: Ozzy and Jack are on a road trip to Mt Rushmore. Jack wants to get an up-close look at the historic site from a helicopter, but Ozzy wants nothing to do with it. So, the two settle their differences the ol' Wild West way: a quick draw shoot out

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers squeeze the City of Orange for some amazing lockers. Ivy gets a hole in one with an unusual landscaping tool, but Mary's fortunes leave her empty-handed

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In this character-driven treasure hunt, bidders range from young adults out for fun and adventure to husband and wife teams looking to make fast cash

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island
programme.desc: After months of tireless effort, Rick, Marty and the team begin the massive excavation at Smith's Cove and almost immediately strike gold

programme.title: WW2 Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: Suggs and Stephen continue their hunt for buried WWII treasure, and discover a tank buried in a vineyard

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: Investigation into a huge pulsating light spotted in the sky near Ohio in 1994. A radar operator describes what he saw, explaining he had "never seen anything move so fast"

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: In Japan stands one of its oldest shrines - the Ishi-no-Hoden megalith. Legend says it depicts a sky ship made of stone that the ancients saw descend from the heavens

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: How did life evolve on Earth? What will life look like on other planets? These and other questions will be answered by a diverse group of scientists. Watch as experiments are done to see if life exists on earth-like planets beyond our solar system

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Mass suicides. Human sacrifices. Unholy rituals. People have claimed to have otherworldly knowledge and have led followers to commit horrific acts of violence. Are they con men? Are they insane? Or are there extraterrestrials with a sinister agenda?

programme.title: The Lost Evidence
programme.desc: In 1942, Nazi troops attacked Stalingrad. The offensive quickly became a murderous one-on-one fight. Reconnaissance photographs reveal the true horror of the battle

programme.title: Heroes Of War
programme.desc: Zegota was an organisation dedicated to helping the Jews of the Polish ghettos. They rejected the inhumanity of Nazi racial policies and spearheaded a high-risk humanitarian project that saved thousands of lives

programme.title: Ancient Top 10
programme.desc: The great empires of the ancient world were created through war, and the most defining battles were fought through siege warfare. From the legendary battle of Troy to the fall of Rome, which siege will top our list for being the most devastating?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Exploring the pervasive concept of the 'Cosmic Egg', in which the universe or some other primordial being comes into existence by the hatching of an egg. Similar ideas occur in the creation myths of many cultures

programme.title: Cities Of The Underworld
programme.desc: Around the world today, lies city upon city, each with its unknown history. This series will examine a city's ancient cisterns, tombs, clandestine hideouts, and underground shipwrecks that have been lost for hundreds and hundreds of years.

programme.title: Ancient Impossible
programme.desc: We show the amazing genius of Archimedes, who managed to make water flow uphill, Philon created the first robot, and Ctesibius who experimented with pneumatics. Heron of Alexandria invented the steam engine, automatic doors and vending machines!

programme.title: Evolve
programme.desc: A look at communication as a key tool for survival, from simple bacteria cooperating to take down creatures a million times their size, to mankind's complex systems of interacting

programme.title: Identity Thief
programme.desc: Even-keeled businessman Sandy Patterson (Jason Bateman) travels from Denver to Miami to track down the woman (Melissa McCarthy) who's been spending his money after stealing his identity

programme.title: The Watch
programme.desc: Four men form a neighborhood watch group to escape their dull family routines. When they discover their idyllic suburb is overrun with aliens in disguise, they have no choice but to save their neighborhoods and the world

programme.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
programme.desc: A painfully introverted freshman is taken under the wings of two effervescent seniors who welcome him to the real world. Stephen Chbosky directs based on his classic 1999 novel

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: This production is an action-comedy starring Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman and John Malkovich. The title is a film adaptation of the comic book by the same name. Former covert ops CIA agent Frank Moses (Bruce Willis) is trying to get adjusted to life in retirement but can’t seem to get over the mind dulling boredom and loneliness of life in retirement. Matters take on a different twist when Frank’s house is raided in the middle of the night by a group of assassins. Frank manages to kill them off and thereafter returns to his long-lost black ops lifestyle – this time he is his own boss and his objective is to find out who exactly is trying to kill him

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Jason Bourne, a former CIA assassin suffering from psychogenic amnesia, wants to learn more of his past as he is once more enveloped in a conspiracy involving the CIA and Operation Treadstone and forced to continue is past life as an assasin for survival

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Once again, Jason Bourne is hunted by the CIA, at the same time where (Nikkei Parsons) penetrates the intelligence database and carries everything she needs. Heather Lee uncover this penetration, and inform her manager Dewey, who orders his team to catch Bourne and Parsons, whom their paths met, which leads Bourne to know more about his previous life

programme.title: Sabotage
programme.desc: John 'Breacher' Wharton (Arnold Schwarzenegger) leads an elite DEA task force that takes on the world's deadliest cartels. When the team successfully executes a high-stakes raid on a cartel safe house, they think their work is done – until, one-by-one, the team members mysteriously start to be eliminated. As the body count rises, everyone is a suspect

programme.title: Face/Off

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: The film centers on an elite assassin who was genetically engineered from conception to be the perfect killing machine, and is known only by the last two digits on the barcode tattooed on the back of his neck. Teaming up with a young woman, his latest target is a mega-corporation that plans to unlock the secret of Agent 47's past to create an army of killers

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: This picture is a science fiction film directed by J. J. Abrams. It is a re-boot of the (Star Trek franchise) and features the main characters of the original Star Trek series, portrayed by a new cast. The picture has received much critical praise and was nominated for four Oscars – winning the Academy Award for Best Makeup, making it the first Star Trek film to win an Oscar. In the year 2233, Federation starship USS Kelvin is attacked by the Narada, a Romulan ship. The Kelvin’s captain is killed. Acting Captain George Kirk (Chris Hemsworth) orders the evacuation of the ship’s personnel, including his pregnant wife who is in labor. Moments before the Kelvin’s destruction, George and his wife decide to name their son Jim. The film then jumps several years to the story of young Spock. Spock is discriminated against by his peers on Vulcan for being half-human. After he matures, he opts to join Starfleet rather than the Vulcan Science Academy. Soon afterwards, the principal crew members of the original Star Trek series: James, Spock and Leonard McCoy, find themselves best situated to respond to a distress call from Vulcan. Thus, the inexperienced cadets find themselves launched head long into a confrontation with the Narada and its captain Nero who was responsible for killing James’ father several years prior

programme.desc: The movie revolves around a security guard who is facing financial problems; forcing him back into doing what he does best-running a contraband with his partner

programme.title: Her
programme.desc: Theodore Twombly (Joaquin Phoenix) is a complex, soulful and lonely writer who has just come out of a relationship heartbroken. He gets involved in a friendship with an advanced operating system impersonating Samantha (Scarlett Johansson), which eventually turns into a romance

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: Jonas, a young man, is living in a seemingly ideal, if colorless, world of conformity and contentment. Yet as he begins to spend time with The Giver, who is the sole keeper of all the community's memories, Jonas quickly begins to discover the dark and deadly truths of his community's secret past

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: In the future, a parasitic alien race invades and overtakes humanity, occupying our bodies and erasing our memories. When Melanie Stryder becomes a host, her will and her memories are strong enough to put up a fight. She forms a bond with her host and sets out to help other free humans

programme.title: Upside Down
programme.desc: Adam and Eden, who fell in love as teens, face a strange obstacle: they live on twin worlds whose gravitational pulls separate the wealthy from the poor and exploited. Ten years after being forced apart, Adam learns she's alive and sets out on a dangerous quest to find his long lost love

programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: Blu is a rare blue parrot who is afraid of heights. He lives a quiet life in a small town somewhere in the United States. Blu’s life changes when he meets “Jewel” – a daring female parrot who represents all that he lacks. Nevertheless the pair fall in love and take a trip together to Rio de Janeiro in Brazil where Blu learns to shake of his fears in what becomes their journey of a lifetime

programme.title: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: Snoopy, the world's most lovable beagle ­ and flying ace ­embarks upon his greatest mission as he takes to the skies to pursue his arch-nemesis The Red Baron, while his best pal, Charlie Brown, begins his own epic quest

programme.title: What to Expect When You're Expecting
The Peanuts Movie

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: The ex-CIA agent Tobin Frost (actor Denzel Washington) turns to be an international criminal. He enters an American consulate and gets moved to a CIA safe house in Cape Town, South Africa. The "housekeeper" of this safe house is Matt Weston (actor Ryan Reynolds), a low-level agent who escapes with Frost when the house got attacked. Weston and Frost must stay out of the gunmen's sight until they can get to another safe house

programme.title: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
programme.desc: This title is a drama that was directed by Oliver Stone. The film is a sequel to the hugely successful 1987 title “Wall Street” and is notable for being the first sequel Stone has made for any of his films. Actor Michael Douglas retains his Oscar-winning role as Gordon Gekko. The film also hosts the talents of Josh Brolin, Carey Mulligan among others while Charlie Sheen makes a brief cameo appearance reprising his role as Bud Fox. The film is set 23 years after the events depicted in the original “Wall Street”. Reformed Wall Street magnate Gordon Gekko (Michael Dougals) tries to help the financial industry avert the upcoming 2008 financial crisis. He also attempts to set things right with his estranged daughter

programme.title: Heist (Bus 657)
programme.desc: When a father finds no way in affording his daughter's medication, he plans a casino robbery with his co-worker; but things go awry and they find themselves forced to hijack a city bus

programme.title: Joe
programme.desc: An ex-con, who is the unlikeliest of role models, meets a 15-year-old boy and is faced with the choice of redemption or ruin

programme.desc: A renowned linguistic with three children and living a happy marriage, Alice starts to forget words. A shocking diagnosis puts her relationship with her family and their inter-personal bonds to test
